EmailTemplate.subject: Volunteer with Free The Children at Wembley Arena!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
Want to volunteer and help out at one the UK's biggest events of the year? The Challenge are partnering with Free The Children and want YOU to come and volunteer at WE Day!
What is WE Day?
WE Day is a powerful, life-changing event that combines the energy of a live concert with the inspiration of extraordinary stories of leadership and change.The event brings together world-renowned speakers and award-winning performers with tens of thousands of young people to celebrate their contributions and kick-start another year of change.
Why Volunteer?
Not only will it look incredible on your personal statement and CV but volunteering at this massive annual event is a once in a lifetime opportunity and is an amazing cause to get involved with. You are guaranteed to have a thoroughly enjoyable day!
Details:
When: Wednesday 9th March 2016
Where: The SSE Arena in Wembley
Interested?
If you are interested in getting involved with this amazing opportunity and wish to volunteer please register here. You will need a code to register associated with The Challenge, so please enter this code GR-NCS2016 when needed. If you would like more information about WE Day please visit the WE day website where you can also send in your own questions.
You don't want to miss out on this opportunity!
The Challenge Society
